title: Explain Agency Relationships to a New Client
description: An agent is meeting a new buyer for the first time and must explain agency law and provide the required disclosure form.

tasks.description: Explain the different types of agency (e.g., seller's agent, buyer's agent, dual agent) in simple terms.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly articulates their role as a buyer's agent and their fiduciary duties.

tasks.description: Provide the state-mandated 'Agency Disclosure' form to the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent presents the correct legal form to the new client.

tasks.description: Obtain the client's signature on the form acknowledging they have received the information.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client signs the disclosure form, and it is saved to their file.
